remarks: Version of ~ dral1 with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  Remark: the corresponding versions for ~ dral2 and ~ drex2 are instances of ~ albidv and ~ exbidv respectively.  (Contributed by BJ, 17-Jun-2019.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-dral1v.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-dral1v $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. x ph <-> A. y ps ) ) $.
$d x y $.
